thoughts.text: The execute_python_file command failed again because the scrape_website_v6.py file is not a valid Python file. I will use the execute_shell command to search for the correct file on the internet.

This will help me ensure that I am adequately prepared for my adventure.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the execute_shell command to search for the correct scrape_website_v6.py file on the internet
- Use the execute_shell command to download the correct file
- Use the execute_python_file command to execute the correct scrape_website_v6.py file and create the output file
- Use the read_file command to read the output of the scrape_website_v6.py file and get the distance and elevation gain of the Brno Reservoir Trail
- Use this information to prepare for my adventure
